d4: Reusable d3 Charts

d4

A friendly charting DSL for d3

Examples

This section demonstrates the various, charts, features and parsers that come bundled with d4. The charts you find here can be considered the canon of charts common to financial and business applications. If you have an idea for a more exotic breed, please do submit a pull-request!

Charts

The following section demonstrates mostly boilerplate examples of the common chart. It is relatively trivial to make a chart type. Most of the hard work is in writing the features themselves.

Column Chart
Basic Column Chart
Grouped Column Chart
Basic Grouped Column Chart
Line Chart
Basic Line Chart
Row Chart
Basic Row Chart
Scatter Plot
Basic Scatter Plot
Stacked Column
Basic Stacked Column
Waterfall Chart
